name: Last Resort Island
detailed_description:
As a castaway you strand on a remote island. Sounds like a romantic adventure in perfect loneliness - but not in this game! After all, that island is literally the last resort of the fleeing masses. An insane survival training full of slapstick fun begins, full of rabid ex tofu lovers and lots of goofy slapstick fun! Whether it's engaging adventures, tricky puzzles, fun text adventures as side quests or even a Solitaire championship in the local tavern – you're always ready to make an utter fool of yourself to support the community.

Achievement hunters can look forward to a big variety of rewards for creative and heroic deeds.

  • Fun story full of whacky slapstick humour
  • Hunt for exiting and creative achievements
  • Create your own survival paradise
  • Zany characters with hilarious one-liners
  • 100 hand-made levels full of intriguing gameplay
  • Build a resort for the islanders: town hall, sugar factory, candy manufacture etc.
  • Face challenging quests
  • Master many different adventures
  • Solve 3 tricky puzzles
  • Text adventures full of gags as side quests
  • Win the Solitaire championship
  • Gain mighty Power Ups such as Power Stones and Power Cards
  • Prevail in merciless sugar battles

short_description: As a castaway you strand on a remote island. And that's just the beginning of a survival adventure with a big helping of goofy slapstick fun! Build your own paradise resort and keep an eye on those ex tofu lovers who have a habit of working up the wrong kind of appetite...
supported_languages: English, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium (or similar AMD) 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
